cause.description:
NOVAM was founded in 1987 by members of concerned faith communities in Northern Virginia who wanted to provide a compassionate response to the AIDS crisis. NOVAM’s goal is to provide comprehensive HIV prevention education to yourth and compassionate services to those infected and affected by HIV/AIDS. NOVAM also offers free and confidential HIV testing and counseling at our Falls Church office.
1. The spread of HIV/AIDS must be stopped.
2. Our Community needs to be educated about HIV/AIDS, to become aware of its ramifications and its victims.
3. Those who are infected/affected by HIV/AIDS require compassionate care services.
4. There is hope for the future.
cause.mission: educate the community about HIV/AIDS, to combat the fear, prejudice, and complacency that surround the disease, and to provide direct services to meet the needs of those who are living with HIV/AIDS.
cause.name: Northern Virginia AIDS Ministry
